description: The most rugged trails call for the most dense cushioning. That's why you need a pair of our Hike Full Cushion Lolo Trail Crew Socks in your sock drawer. Made with responsibly sourced Merino wool, these hiking socks feature our top sock technologies to help ensure comfort and confidence every time you head for the summit. Experience a higher degree of comfort, fit, and durability on all your trails with Smartwool.
name: Smartwool Hike Full Cushion Lolo Trail Crew Socks - Mens

specs.value: 63% Merino Wool, 12% Nylon, 23% Recycled Nylon, 2% Elastane
